channel.title: Were back( =LegionPkerz--All for fun Pk Server With Customs up 24-7 JOIN TODAY
channel.description: [size=14pt]LEGIONPKERZ!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!![/size]NOOBSCAPE BASE just for fun server..Max stat is 115 max combat is 143 more than enough training places 55.0x xp rate for fast training many custom items and rares come try it out and have fun killing your friends!!! up 24-7 visit our forums to download client or just visit the download link below. http://legionpkerz.webs.com/ DOWNLOAD LINK-- http://www.mediafire.com/?ta5ixbyyvebyo6b If anyone has a problem or needs any help pm me I'll send you my msn NOTE: I had more pics but I'm lazy :P SOME COMMANDS... ::c = clan ::accept ::wipebank ::go ::Stuck = takes you to edge ::skull ::leave ::onlinelist ::fatigue ::invite ::online ::say ::clan = see clan members [img]http://www.mediafire.com/imgbnc.php/b7786aae282e44c1d9643c71b430f5ee148edc8a8bcd3dd9818b3d3d0f5c7b846g.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.mediafire.com/imgbnc.php/7c1761ebf88658ef46febb374025c945fa0d38610778762ff809f3c99b78f4c36g.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.mediafire.com/imgbnc.php/9ee59988c167a0d4e95dc9bc56946df0e57e16fc01d024b5a71707ee1c7f75b96g.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.mediafire.com/imgbnc.php/5ff087a27cd9fca5e21e135823808ee2879e11c761a5aba45b35580f938d4b9b6g.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.mediafire.com/imgbnc.php/e1fd07d21996e3fca27632509c363d4da369b870392793c98319233910d801596g.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.mediafire.com/imgbnc.php/fce3c70182d1c4d21a9ea473361d93aa371bd663ecc17fe11cf4721079e432dd6g.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.mediafire.com/imgbnc.php/7516321abb18e442a2dc66d0a53595f1c529fa51557bfa6b8bcf65bbd4b14fff6g.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.mediafire.com/imgbnc.php/6b497d4af04db010714ee91a465c962a3dd2e82bfe6640a54abaaa957e88c42c6g.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.mediafire.com/imgbnc.php/8552578c144ff8fc804834ff5cc87e2c897e6f0b16ee00796cb83f85eba7b41d6g.jpg[/img]
